Multi-Agent Path Planning and Navigation with A* and Q-Learning documentationÂ¶

Multi-Agent Navigation Environment for reinforcement learning research.

This package provides:

  • A custom PettingZoo environment for multi-agent navigation with obstacles

  • A Node class for pathfinding

  • A test file for training a Q-Learning policy using the environment
